summary: Develop backend APIs for savings goals management to implement an AI-Powered Smart Savings Goals Feature. This involves creating RESTful APIs for CRUD operations and progress tracking of savings goals. The development poses security risks due to potential collection and processing of sensitive financial data and customer information. Additional concerns include the provision of test user credentials that could be vulnerable to unauthorized access, potential exposure of sensitive application architecture details, and lack of information about user transparency, feedback, or control over personal data processing.
short: The task is to develop backend APIs for managing savings goals. This includes creating RESTful APIs for CRUD operations and progress tracking of savings goals. The primary objective is to implement an AI-powered smart savings goals feature.
